duties_responsibilities.duty: Comply with branch operational requirements by completing invoices, processing returns, receiving and processing replenishment shipments, maintaining branch stock/sales literature and event displays, conducting inventory checks, preparing and shipping orders as well as branch transfers, and accurately completing all associated paperwork.
Maintain and support Will Call Stock sales floor to enhance the sales experience for our customers
Organize warehouse to ensure ease of locating product
Ensure a clean and safe work environment at all times
Assist in the physical inventory process
Demonstrate exceptional levels of service for both internal and external customers
